ARABIC: وَرَأَيْتَ ٱلنَّاسَ يَدْخُلُونَ فِى دِينِ ٱللَّهِ أَفْوَاجًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and you have seen people entering Allah's deen in droves,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And you see men enter God's discipline horde on horde,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and you see people entering Allah's religion in multitudes,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: you will see large groups of people embracing the religion of God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And you see people entering the religion of Allah in multitudes,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And you see that the people enter Allah's religion in crowds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And you see men entering the religion of Allah in companies,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and thou seest men entering God's religion in throngs,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And thou seest mankind entering the religion of Allah in troops,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and you see people entering God's religion in multitudes,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And thou beholdest mankind entering the religion of Allah in crowds,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and you see the people entering Allah’s religion in throngs,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And thou dost see the people enter Allah's Religion in crowds,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And you see that the people enter Allah's religion (Islam) in crowds,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and you see people embracing the Religion of Allah in throngs,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And you see the people entering God’s religion in multitudes.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And you see the people entering into the religion of Allah in multitudes,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [110:2] and you see people entering God’s religion, that is to say, Islam, in throngs, in large droves, after they had been entering one by one — this was after the conquest of Mecca, when the Arabs from all corners of the   land came to him willingly [in obedience to his command] —
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: And thou seest mankind) the people of Yemen and others (entering the religion of Allah) Islam (in troops) entire groups at a time, when this happens, know that you will die.
